citations.narrative:
There is an opened bag of dry dog kibble that is not inside a leakproof container with a tightly fitted lid. When this was
pointed out during the inspection, a facility representative promptly placed the bag in a large, plastic tote box with a tight-
fitting lid.
Food or bedding that is opened to the surrounding environment can be easily contaminated by pests or vermin. All open
supplies of food and bedding must be kept in leakproof containers with tightly fitting lids to prevent contamination and
spoilage.
CORRECTED AT THE TIME OF INSPECTION ON 09/04/2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n
